result.title: Lab scale process for CO2-based cyclic carbonates into new end-products formulations
result.description: Report to describe the experimental results of the new applications of the new bio-based cyclic carbonates developed by Funditec (D3.4) that will be tested in glass ware polycarbonate synthesis to make novel polymers and to investigate their potential application with a close to market point of view and potential scale-up.

result.title: Structure-performance correlations & principles of catalyst performance
result.description: Report on (1) the final development and performance optimization of syngas-to-aromatics catalyst, describing the optimized catalyst synthesis, formulation, textural properties and optimal operation conditions for intensified aromatic production; and (2) built structure-performance models and rules.

result.title: Development and optimization of electrocatalysts for glycols oxidation
result.description: Report focused on the preliminary laboratory results of the electrocatalysis technology based on the simultaneous CO2 electrochemical conversion and glycols oxidation for biopolymers applications. result.title: Optimisation of syngas fermentation for 2,3-BDO production
result.description: Report to describe the experimental protocol and best bioreactor operational conditions used to obtain the highest yield of 2,3-DBO by the fermentation of Clostridium strains using syngas as a source of carbon and energy.
